dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset is used for semantic urban scene understanding, containing high-resolution images with pixel-level annotations for various urban classes.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:description: GTA5 is a synthetic dataset generated from the video game Grand Theft Auto V, providing a large number of labeled images for training semantic segmentation models.
dcterms:title: GTA5

dcterms:creator: German Ros

dcterms:description: SYNTHIA is a large collection of synthetic images designed for semantic segmentation of urban scenes, providing diverse scenarios and conditions.
dcterms:title: SYNTHIA
